title: I GOT BANNED? WAS I HACKED? HOW DO I PETITION FOR AN UNBAN, I HAVE HUNDREDS SPENT ON ACCOUNT PLS HLP
body:
I got banned, I have no email telling me why and I have not been recently banned apart from that.
I couldn't get onto my account for a few days, for some reason it was not connecting. Finally after about three days somethings starts looking like it's working...A notification pops us saying I have been banned. 
I think the last time I was banned was at least 6 months ago due to disconnecting in games because of bad internet, can't remember. 
Not saying I've never been toxic, but I haven't at all lately. 
I did not receive any warnings, no short term bans, and even no longer term bans like week bans. Just straight up Perma.

replies.body:
You[ send a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support and kindly ask them what it was for. 

Here are some guidelines for submitting a support ticket that will ensure the smoothest and fastest response possible:

> Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient
You're really hard to get a hold of, outside of OCE you know that :/

Thank you, yeah I figured out the the ticket thing like half an hour ago haha. 
Hopefully they get back to me asap I think I followed the rules prior to reading this anyway. 
Thank you for the reply.

oldest trick in the book!

Yeah I've seen that a few people have tried that. But I actually don't know why I was banned, I didn't get an email and I couldn't get on my account for the three days previous to getting the ban. so yah haha hopefully they can tell me why.
